title: Grateful Dead Live at Veterans' Memorial Coliseum on 1981-05-12
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 2448
source: 3x Nakamichi CM-300 w/CP-1 cardioids > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell XL-II 90's. Mics handheld, recorded from left side (stage right) first-level riser, about half way back.
